name: Shuttle 62
description:
Pilot Shuttle 62 through space on your daring mission to locate the moon, harvest space diamonds, and upgrade your ship. But be careful! Don't stray too far into the unknown, who knows what lurks there in the shadows.

Shuttle 62 is an atmospheric space adventure game created in my own engine 'Hex Engine'. This is the first game I have produced using this engine, and I am really pleased with the results. I hope you enjoy playing this short prototype game that was made for Mini Jam 130 . I'd love to continue developing it if enough people like it and see potential.

Shuttle controls:

WASD - Normal controls (forward, backwards, left, right)

Q - Roll Left

E - Roll right

Ctrl - Pitch down

Space - Pitch up

Shift - Booster

Left mouse - fire the weapon (when it becomes enabled)

Home - enter the shop (only usable when close enough to the moon)
